subdisciplines.name: Nuclear fusion
subdisciplines.description: The study of merging atomic nuclei to form heavier atoms in the Sun and other stars.

subdisciplines.name: Nuclear fission
subdisciplines.description: The study of splitting atomic nuclei to produce energy and radioactive isotopes.

subdisciplines.name: Nuclear astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the behavior of matter under extreme conditions found in stars and supernovae.

subdisciplines.name: Nuclear medicine
subdisciplines.description: The use of radioactive isotopes in medical diagnosis and treatment.
